code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{toggleDarkMode,setLanguage}from'../store/themeSlice';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navigation=()=>{const location=useLocation();const dispatch=useDispatch();const{isDarkMode,language}=useSelector(state=>state.theme);const navItems=[{path:'/',label:'È¶ñÈ°µ'},{path:'/timeline',label:'ÂèëÂ±ïËÑâÁªú'},{path:'/themes',label:'‰∏ªÈ¢òÂØπÊØî'},{path:'/works',label:'‰ª£Ë°®‰ΩúÂìÅ'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"bg-white shadow-lg",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container mx-auto px-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between items-center h-16",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex items-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"text-xl font-bold text-primary",children:"\u79D1\u5E7B\u6587\u5316\u5BF9\u6BD4"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hidden md:flex items-center space-x-8",children:navItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:item.path,className:"".concat(location.pathname===item.path?'text-primary border-b-2 border-primary':'text-gray-600 hover:text-primary'," px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium transition-colors duration-200"),children:item.label},item.path))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>dispatch(toggleDarkMode()),className:"p-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-100",children:isDarkMode?'üåû':'üåô'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>dispatch(setLanguage(language==='zh'?'en':'zh')),className:"px-3 py-1 rounded-md text-sm font-medium bg-gray-100 hover:bg-gray-200",children:language==='zh'?'EN':'‰∏≠Êñá'})]})]})})});};export default Navigation;
